title: 【やさしい日本語】建物(たてもの)や 公園(こうえん)に、 ウクライナの 旗(はた)の 色(いろ)の 光(ひかり)を 映(うつ)す
cleaned_sentences: The colour of the Ukrainian flag (light) Russia is attacking its neighboring country, Ukraine.
Many people have died or fled to other countries.
In Japan, many people want Russia to stop attacking.
Fukuoka Prefecture has begun something special in hoping for peace to return to Ukraine.
At night, blue and yellow lights are reflected in two locations in Fukuoka City.
It is the color of the flag of the Ukraine country.
The building, the former Prefectural Public Hall, in Chuo Ward, Fukuoka City, reflects light throughout the night.
Nakajima in Ohori Park is open until 10pm.
I plan to continue for a while.
The Fukuoka Prefecture governor said, "I would like to express my wish for peace just like you all."
The original article is here Easy Japanese We deliver news translated into "easy Japanese" that is easy for foreigners and children to understand.
